sources.title: They Were So Young (1954) Scott Brady | Drama, Mystery | Full Movie | Subtitles added!
sources.description:
TOO INNOCENT! TOO WILLING! AND FAR, FAR TOO EAGER!â€¦ AND SO BEAUTIFUL!
A model agency in Rio de Janeiro is actually a front for a slavery ring that kidnaps European women and sells them on the South American sex market.

Colorized version https://youtu.be/rkUZss5GVKQ

Director: Kurt Neumann
Writers: Felix LÃ¼tzkendorf, Kurt Neumann, Jacques CompanÃ©ez
Stars: Scott Brady, Johanna Matz, Raymond Burr

0:00 ğŸ’ƒ A group of girls arrive at a fashion house in Latin America and meet the owner, who advises them on their private lives and encourages them to make connections.
18:24 ğŸ”’ A person feels trapped and seeks help to escape a situation where they are being controlled and prevented from leaving.
22:08 ğŸ” A woman is caught up in a scheme at an establishment and seeks help, but is dismissed and left feeling alone and trapped.
26:47 ğŸ” A person recounts a series of events involving a woman, a hotel, and a misunderstanding.
35:14 ğŸ”’ A person is discussing a plan to seek help from someone influential in their country to resolve a situation, while also mentioning their concern for a friend and their own financial situation.
42:16 ğŸ” A conversation takes place where someone is thanked and apologizes for hurting another person, and plans are made to secure papers. Later, it is revealed that someone has changed their mind and wants to stay where they are.
1:00:46 ğŸ” The speaker investigates the whereabouts of someone named Eve.
1:02:44 ğŸ’€ A witness is being hunted on a riverboat and an undercover police officer helps protect her.
1:16:05 ğŸ’¥ A confrontation occurs between two individuals, leading to a job loss and a journey to the airport.
